attributes.action: Do NOT Print the Cartoon Image of our Beloved Prophet Mohammed(saw)
attributes.additional_details: As No-one knows how our beloved Prophet Mohammed(saw) looks like in reality, as no-one has seen our beloved Prophet Mohammed(saw), it is a very wrong decision to publish a cartoon image of our beloved Prophet Mohammed(saw), Please put a STOP to this image publishing in the UK and in any country taking this decision, NOW its the time to put a STOP to this Publishing from happening. No one would make a Image of any ones God or Prophet this would be very disrespectful then WHY our beloved Prophet Mohammed(saw)
